attributes.action: Stop the discimination of British Merchant Seamen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Workers in the UK have a right to bring an individual claim against their employer to a Employment Tribunal. However the rights of an individual seafarer are specifically excluded from the Employment Tribunals juristiction.
I am asking the Government/Shipping Minister to make an amendment to the law which would give Merchant Seamen the same equal rights as shore based workers.We are tired of been treated like second class citizens.
